title: Episode 226: Pesto, Three Ways
description:
We now have three pesto recipes on our website: classic green, spicy red, and creamy white. (You're welcome.) Andy Baraghani, Molly Baz, and Carla Lalli Music explain the process behind each version they developed and even get a little existential (what even is pesto?).
Get the recipes from this episode:
BA's Best Pesto
Red Pesto Pasta
White Pesto
